Class TextButton

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      UI
          ClickableButton
              TextButton

public class TextButton
extends ClickableButton

A Generic Button to display text that is clickable. Owned by a World, which controls click capturing.

Version:
v0.1.5
Author:
Jordan Cohen
